        public void storeObject(Record r,
               Boolean writeThru)
                 throws IOException,
                        InterruptedException,
                        KiraException
        Store index the object and pass thru to the backing store
        Parameters:
        r - The Record object to be indexed/stored
        writeThru - True if writing to the backing store, false if indexing only (i.e. to refresh an object index)
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • executeQuery

        public <T extends Record> List<T> executeQuery(Record r,
                                      String queryFieldName,
                                      String querystr,
                                      String sortFieldName,
                                      Boolean reverse)
                                    throws KiraException,
                                           IOException,
                                           ClassNotFoundException
        Query for matching records

        Set queryFieldName to restrict results to records where that fields matches the querystr value.

        If queryFieldName is null and querystr is specified, the first field in the Record descriptor is selected by default.

        If both queryFieldName and querystr are null then all records match (useful for retrieving sorted lists of Records).

        sortFieldName may be specified to order the results, otherwise a default "date" field ordering is used, or object ordering (none) if no "date" field exists.

        Parameters:
        r - An instance of the Class / Record
        queryFieldName - The name to the field to query
        querystr - The query string
        sortFieldName - Optional sort field name
        reverse - Set to true to reverse the sort order
        Returns:
        List list of matching records
        Throws:
        KiraException
        IOException
        ClassNotFoundException

      • executeQuery

        public <T extends Record> List<T> executeQuery(Record r,
                                      String queryFieldName,
                                      String querystr,
                                      int hitsPerPage,
                                      int skipDocs,
                                      String sortFieldName,
                                      Boolean reverse)
                                    throws KiraException,
                                           IOException,
                                           ClassNotFoundException
        Query for matching records

        Set queryFieldName to restrict results to records where that fields matches the querystr value.

        If queryFieldName is null and querystr is specified, the first field in the Record descriptor is selected by default.

        If both queryFieldName and querystr are null then all records match (useful for retrieving sorted lists of Records).

        sortFieldName may be specified to order the results, otherwise a default "date" field ordering is used, or object ordering (none) if no "date" field exists.

        Parameters:
        r - An instance of the Class / Record
        queryFieldName - The name to the field to query
        querystr - The query string
        hitsPerPage - The number of records to return
        skipDocs - The number of records to skip
        sortFieldName - Optional sort field name
        reverse - Set to true to reverse the sort order
        Returns:
        List list of matching objects
        Throws:
        KiraException
        IOException
        ClassNotFoundException

      • executeQuery

        public <T extends Record> List<T> executeQuery(Record r,
                                      Field queryField,
                                      String querystr,
                                      int hitsPerPage,
                                      int skipDocs,
                                      Field sortField,
                                      Boolean reverse)
                                    throws KiraException,
                                           IOException,
                                           ClassNotFoundException
        Query for matching records
        Parameters:
        r - An instance of the Class / Record
        queryField - The field to query
        querystr - The query string
        hitsPerPage - The number of records to return
        skipDocs - The number of records to skip
        sortField - Optional sort field or null
        reverse - Set to true to reverse the sort order
        Returns:
        List
